prompt: Design a contact support page with a bold red theme for a striking appearance. Use a white background (Colors.white). Center content with 24px padding. Display a 'Support Desk' title in deep red (Colors.red[900]) with a bold font. Add a subtitle 'Weâ€™re ready to assist' in grey (Colors.grey[600]). Include a form with Name (person icon), Email (email icon), and Message (multiline, message icon) fields, each with a light red background (Colors.red[50]) and red borders (Colors.red[700]). Arrange contact cards for Phone, Email, and Live Chat in a horizontal row, each with a red background (Colors.red[100]) and rounded corners. Place a 'Submit Now' button at the bottom with a deep red background (Colors.red[900]) and white text. Use 16px spacing for a balanced layout.
